summary: A test suite that validates the legacy work‑queue functionality of the Prefect server, covering queue creation, selection based on tags and identifiers, retrieval of flow runs with various filters and concurrency limits, and update operations, using helper utilities to set up data and assert expected behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee that the deprecated tag‑based work‑queue matching logic continues to operate correctly, preserving backward compatibility and reliable scheduling of deployments and flow runs.
